get.description: Get the attributes which used by items of this category

parameters.name: {attribute_name}
parameters.description: If set a value to an attribute name, then get paginated results, of these items with this attribute value. Ex ?title=Shakespeare.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Set the page number if not set page is 1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Set the items number per page if not set the number of items is 10

Show all subscribed users. Require admin user role.

get.description: Show user/subscriber details. Show details only for connected user. Admin users show all.

put.description: Change user/subscriber details. Change details only for connected user. Admin users can changes all.
